full_summary:
# Design, Fabrication, and Installation of an 80.8m Guyed VHF Tower

### Title
Design, fabrication, and installation of one 80.8m guyed VHF Tower at Cape Pine, NL.

### Reference Number
cb-80-58610404

### Solicitation Number
30005018

### Contract Status
Expired.

### Project Overview

The project involves the design, fabrication, and installation of an 80.8m guyed VHF tower at a proposed location at the Cape Pine Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) site. The work includes all labour, materials, and equipment required to complete the project according to the specifications and drawings provided.

### Two-Phase Selection Process

The procurement will follow a two-phase selection process:

1.  **Pre-Qualification Phase**: This phase will evaluate the qualifications of all bidders.
2.  **Financial Bid Phase**: The qualified bidders will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project.

### Security Requirement

There are no security requirements associated with this project.

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Type**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Procurement Category**: CNST
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   **Name**: Cal LaKing
*   **Email**: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (506) 478-3581

### Tender Files

The tender files are available for download from the Canada Buy Service:

*   **English Version**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32008/30005018---rfq.pdf>
*   **French Version**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32008/30005018---rfq_fr.pdf>
